name: Crate Punks
description: After the death of the C.E.Overlord, the factories kept making crates, the drones kept delivering them, and no one could shut it down... It was... ... ... ... ... THE CRATENING.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / Windows 10 Processor: 2.80 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / Windows 10 Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 150 MB available space
